name: Material Design Text Fields / Inputs (Outlined)
description:
Material Design - Text Fields 


In this file I collected the outlined Material Design Text Field Styles.

Easy to use and customizable.



Featuring:


Text Fields:

• Text (Single-line)

• Text + Right Icon

• Text + Left Icon

• Text + Double Icon

• Helper Text

• Counter


States:

• Default

• Hover

• Focused

• Filled

• Disabled


Types of Inputs

• Default

• Dropdowns

• Datepicker

• Timer

• Clear

• Password
